name: Kleinhalija Demo 1
description:
Just a demo of a bullet hell. I want to develop it to have some kind of horror elements and 7 zones, but right now we're sitting at two zones, two bosses, and a handful of enemies.

Inspired by (a.k.a is a worse clone of)  white.hat, another itch.io game. Definitely check that one out if you like the concept of this one!
